item.description:
Doors open at 7 - no cover before 9 pm
$5 cover from 9pm-1am
with Yours Truly as the DJ
Meetup Members get their requests played first !
Unless you ask for something REALLY bad like Andy Williams or Paul Anka

WE'LL BE PLAYING THE LATEST AND THE GREATEST
I have over 100,000 songs -

I did this a few times a couple of months ago and it was a good time.
Sorry for the short notice but they just asked me.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the DJ - the Pavillion is down the driveway - the f1st building on the Left

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Last Minute MeetUp - Dancing at Bay Pointe Country Club in Onset this FRIDAY !
